resource.chars:
an answer - time which I can
ill spare because I am already 
overworked with adverse conditions -
and wasted because the very 
maximum of result that I 
can hope for is to convince 
Captain Scott or other people 
that his protest is not justified.
But before finishing off 
my reply I think I had better
 see you. If you are likely to 
be at the Athenaeum sometime
